original_text: They came to the house of the Lord Almighty to speak to the priests and to the prophets. They asked, ‘Should we cry and not eat our food in the fifth month? We have done this for many years.’
korean_text: 만군의 여호와의 전에 있는 제사장들과 선지자들에게 물어 이르되 내가 여러 해 동안 행한 대로 오월 중에 울며 근신하리이까 하매

sentences.original_text: They came to the house of the Lord Almighty
to speak to the priests and to the prophets
Should we cry and not eat our food in the fifth month?
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 다섯째 달에 울고 음식을 먹지 말아야 합니까?

sentences.original_text: We have done this for many years
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이것을 여러 해 동안 해왔습니다
